title: OnePlus Buds Pro add shiny new ‘Radiant Silver’ finish, available today
content:
OnePlus is releasing the familiar OnePlus Buds Pro with a brand new colorway – Radiant Silver. This new edition keeps all of the same features found in the OnePlus Buds Pro but stands out a little bit more.

more…

The post OnePlus Buds Pro add shiny new ‘Radiant Silver’ finish, available today appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The OnePlus Buds Pro are being revitalized with a brand-new silver color and are on sale starting today at $149.99.
